@LowBoonKeong Also, for CUDA builds, you have to specify the CUDA_HOST_COMPILER explicitly, add linking to THC.lib(or in 0.3.0 ATen.lib) and change extern THCState* state into the following:

#include <ATen/ATen.h>
AT_API at::Context &at::globalContext();
THCState *state = at::globalContext().thc_state;
